attributes.action: Create a landlords charter where landlords can list rogue/bad tenants
attributes.additional_details: To protect good landlords from rogue/bad tenants as suffering at the hands of one could leave landlords with only 1 or 2 properties in a very vulnerable place financially. This would also ensure the standard of properties rented out.
attributes.background:
Create a landlords charter where good landlords can register their properties as met an agreed standard and can list rogue/bad tenants so that other private landlords do not suffer loss of income and/or damage to their properties. 
Also list good tenants so references are validated not fraudulent.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about sharing information about tenants and prospective tenants are a matter for individual landlords, provided the data is shared in a way that is consistent with data protection legislation.

It's also not clear in what circumstances you want landlords to be able to "list" tenants.
